name: Harmonious Discord - Game Tools 1 Assignment
description:
Tensions are rising worldwide, and it seems that someone is trying to light the fires of war.

But violence is never the answer, and fighting accomplishes nothing.  Fueled by your courage and hope, you set out to save the world your way; with peace, love, and some catchy tunes.

Music by Yubatake at OpenGameArt.org, part of their JRPG Collection.
https://opengameart.org/content/jrpg-collection

Sounds by Little Robot Sound Factory on OpenGameArt.org, part of their 8-Bit Sound Effects Library
https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-sound-effects-library

www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com

Submission for a 1st year Game Design assignment. 3D game built in Unity with the theme of 'Effort'.
